title: Tyler1
body:
Does Tyler1 prove that Riot is failing to implement measures to catch these types of people? The reason I think this is this because he Trolled for a very long time before getting caught. 

Maybe I'm just cynical, but Riot seems to put in a lot of effort for new champs, new skin and all those other things that make them cash. But when it come to a working tribunal (especially in OCE) we have to wait for... well ... how many years now?

replies.body: They're quick with chat bans but everything else they fail to deal with properly.

Hi,

I think Riot nor Tyler is too blame here.
Honestly Everyone is going off at Riot, But they were doing there job.
Cops Bust Drug dealers houses FULL of weed plants, And is it there fault
because they failed too Punish them/Catch them early? no.
Just giving a example.

They Obviously were in a sticky situation. People Love Tyler1 and I do too.
And Riot MAY HAVE seen Banning Tyler1 Off the game was a big move & Might end up bad for both partys.
There is alot too go into here, and Alot of arguments for each side.

I just believe people should drop the arguments and Anyone that brings it up should be warned or banned.
Its just drama and People are getting the blame. Both of them did the wrong thing.

-RedPandaFox
